gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
The breakdown of a system, plan, or discussion
je neuspeh ali konec sistema, načrta ali pogovora.

seg.quote: There was a serious breakdown of communications.

sense.def:
To suffer a breakdown
pomeni postati tako potrt, da se ne moremo več soočiti z življenjem.

To have a breakdown
, kadar potujemo z avtom, pomeni, da avto med vožnjo preneha delovati.

A breakdown of something
je seznam posameznih sestavnih delov nečesa.

seg.quote: Mr Willis gave the following breakdown.
